line.originaltext: 4 (1.55 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy bar, broken into rectangles
line.annotation: create_ing(ing62, "4 (1.55 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy bar, broken into rectangles")

line.originaltext: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar.
line.annotation: combine({ing56, ing57}, ing64, "creamed", "cream in a large mixing bowl")

line.originaltext: Add egg yolk and vanilla; mix well.
line.annotation: combine({ing58, ing59, ing64}, ing65, "more creamed", "mix well")

line.originaltext: Combine flour and salt; add to creamed mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing60, ing61, ing65}, ing66, "even more creamed", "combine")

line.originaltext: Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-18 minutes or until golden brown.

line.originaltext: Immediately place candy bar pieces over crust.
line.annotation: combine({ing62, ing68}, ing69, "adorned cookies", "place candy pieces on top as soon as removed from oven")

line.originaltext: Let stand for 1 minute or until softened; spread chocolate evenly.
